description: The problem is a runtime error that occurs when attempting to update a Bytearray. When the update is attempted, the Bytearray raises an error saying that it cannot be updated because it is not a mutable object.
code:
# Program to demonstrate use of Bytearray

# Importing modules
import array

# Initializing Bytearray
byteArr = bytearray()

# Adding elements to Bytearray using append()
byteArr.append(
